```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(peekbankr)
library(lme4)
library(ggpmisc)
library(ggrepel)
library(ggthemes)

# Seed for random number generation
set.seed(42)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache.extra = knitr::rand_seed, cache = TRUE, 
                      message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE)

load(file = here("data","3A_df_clean.Rds"))
load(file = here("data","3B_d_rt_dt.Rds"))
```


RT model: 

```{r}
mod_rt <- lmer(log_rt ~ log_age_centered +
              (1 | administration_id) + 
              (1 | dataset_name) + 
              (log_age_centered | target_label), 
            data = d_rt_dt)
```

Accuracy model:

```{r}
mod_acc <- lmer(elogit_baseline ~ log_age_centered * animate_target + 
                  log_age_centered * animate_distractor +
                  (1 | administration_id) + 
                  (log_age_centered | dataset_name) + 
                  (log_age_centered | target_label) + 
                  (1 | distractor_label), 
                data = df_clean_bc, 
                control = lmerControl(optimizer="bobyqa"))


```
